Author: GalimahB
Title: Build Your Ignite Schedule: Top Sessions for Developers
EnhancedContent:
## Plan your Microsoft Ignite experience around the topics that matter most to you

### **Get Ready for Microsoft Ignite**

Welcome back to our Azure Tech Community Microsoft Ignite 2025 series!

If you joined us for [Your Guide to Azure Community Activations at Microsoft Ignite 2025](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/blog/azure-events/your-guide-to-azure-community-activations-at-microsoft-ignite-2025/4455501), you already know that Microsoft Ignite isn’t just about product updates, it’s where ideas, innovation, and community come together.

With hundreds of sessions across every area of Azure, it can be hard to know where to focus. That’s why we’ve curated a list of sessions tailored specifically for **Developers** to help you make the most of your time, strengthen your technical strategy, and get inspired for the year ahead.

Use the Microsoft Ignite session scheduler feature in the [session catalog](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions) to personalize your agenda, save your favorites, and organize your time at Microsoft Ignite.

### **Make Every Minute Count: Top Recommended Sessions for Developers**

Microsoft Ignite moves fast, so it pays to plan your path before you arrive.

By organizing your schedule around your interests and goals, you’ll be able to maximize learning opportunities, connect with peers, and leave with actionable insights.

The recommendations below highlight our top picks for Developers who want to build, modernize, and innovate using Azure and AI.

1. [***Reimagining software development with GitHub Copilot and AI agents***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/BRK105?source=sessions) **** (BRK105)
Discover how AI is transforming the development workflow, from writing code to managing pull requests, and boosting productivity.
2. [***Build AI Apps fast with GitHub and Azure AI Foundry in action***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/BRK110?source=sessions) **** (BRK110)
Explore how to build, train, and deploy intelligent apps using GitHub and Azure AI Foundry in record time.
3. [***Building and deploying data agents in Microsoft Fabric***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/THR738) **** (THR738)
Learn how to build, deploy, and manage intelligent data agents in Microsoft Fabric using curated data, Git-powered CI/CD, and best practices for enterprise-scale AI integration.
4. [***CI/CD for Fabric: Accelerating Lakehouse to production in 25 minutes***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/THR739?source=sessions) **** (THR739) Bring software-engineering rigor to your data with Microsoft Fabric—learn how to use Git-integrated deployment pipelines, parameterized deployments, and automated checks to confidently operationalize your Lakehouse from validation to production.
5. [***Build A2A and MCP Systems using SWE Agents and agent‑framework***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/c2b74e85-85ef-4a12-92f3-45c9234db913) **** (LAB513)Explore how to build, orchestrate, and deploy multi‑agent systems with the new agent‑framework, SWE Agents, and MCP—hands‑on and production‑minded.

Before diving into your targeted sessions, make time for these essential moments that set the stage for everything happening at Microsoft Ignite.

1. [***Opening Keynote***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/KEY01?source=sessions) **** (KEY01)
Hear from Microsoft leaders as they unveil the latest innovations shaping the future of AI, cloud, and the developer ecosystem. This is the session that sets the tone for the entire event.
2. [***Innovation Session: Your AI Apps and Agent Factory***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/BRK1706?source=sessions) **** (BRK1706)                                                                                                                                           Join Microsoft engineering leaders as they explore the foundational AI capabilities powering the Microsoft Cloud. Learn how Azure AI services,         Copilot experiences, and responsible AI frameworks come together to help developers and organizations innovate faster

1. [***Innovation Session: Agents at work: Shaping the future of business***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions?filter=&search=BRK1708&sortBy=relevance) (BRK1708)                                                                                                                    Learn how AI-powered agents and digital workers are reshaping collaboration and productivity. This session showcases real-world use cases across  Microsoft 365, Dynamics, and Azure ecosystems.

### **Plan Smarter with the Session Scheduler**

With the **“** **add to schedule** **”** **** **feature** in the [session catalog](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions) you’ll be able to:

- Browse and filter all Microsoft Ignite sessions by topic, product, or persona.
- Save your favorite sessions to build a personalized schedule.
- Set reminders and block time for networking, community booths, and demos.

### **Stay Connected with the Azure Tech Community**

Your Microsoft Ignite journey doesn’t stop when the sessions end, the conversation continues across the Azure Tech Community. Share the sessions you’re most excited about using **#MSIgnite** **#AzureTechCommunity**, tag **[azure​](javascript:void%280%29)**, and connect with other developers exploring the future of cloud management and security.

Follow the [Azure Tech Community](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/category/Azure) for real-time updates, announcements, and product news throughout Ignite.

### **See You at Microsoft Ignite 2025**

With the right plan in place, every session becomes an opportunity to learn, grow, and connect.

Explore these recommendations, save your favorites, and get ready for an unforgettable [Microsoft Ignite 2025](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/home) experience.

Updated Nov 11, 2025

Version 2.0
